Html:
Hi,

I've just try to paste the youtube videos HTML embedding code into the HTML jHtmlArea. I have pasted the code in the HTML view of the jHtmlArea, but when I go back to the wysiwyg view, I see nothing. The content is there, but the end user have no feedback at all in the wysiwyg area.

Would it be possible to visualize the youtube video or, at least, some icon in order to have some feedback?

Regards,

David

1. init

$('textarea').htmlarea({css: '/inc/css/jHtmlArea-inner.css'});

2. css

object {
    background: silver;
    border: 1px solid red;
    display: block;
}

object object{
    background: none;
    border: 0;
    display: none;
}
